item.title: Rust Axum Graceful Shutdown, The Ultimate Guide: Fix the pitfall 99% of engineers hit
item.description: Master graceful shutdown for Rust Axum services: listen for SIGINT/SIGTERM, refuse new connections with with_graceful_shutdown, stop background tasks via CancellationToken, set timeouts, and integrate with Docker/Kubernetes termination — protect data integrity and user experience.
